title: Sheffield United's Oli McBurnie 'charged with drink driving after being pulled over by police'
text:
Sheffield United striker Oli McBurnie has been charged with drink driving offences.

The Scotland international was arrested after police stopped his Audi R8 in west Yorkshire on Friday morning.

The 23-year-old, who joined joined the Blades from Swansea this summer in a club record £20million deal, has scored one goal in 10 club appearances this season.

Sheffield United striker Oli McBurnie has been charged with drink driving

McBurnie will appear before Leeds Magistrates' Court on November 6.

A police spokesperson told The Sun: 'Oliver McBurnie was charged with driving over the prescribed limit in Leeds on Friday October 18.'

McBurnie's Sheffield United return to Premier League action on Monday when they take on Arsenal at Bramall Lane.
description: Sheffield United striker Oli McBurnie has been charged with drink driving offences. The Scotland international was arrested in west Yorkshire on Friday morning.
